summary: MOUSE KILLED  IN BETWEEN AC/HEAT FAN BLOWER & CABIN AIR FILTER ! 2ND TIME THIS HAS HAPPEN. 1ST.TIME GOT FIX UNDER WARRANTEE.NOW MY WARRANTEE IS UP (39000 MILES) CAR WAS MOVING 500FT. FROM HOME.  TURNED AC ON ,BANG! BANG! TURN IT OFF/ I KNEW WHAT HAPPEN. THE 1ST. TIME THEY HAD TO REPLACE FAN BLOWER / IT VIBRATES LOUDER THAN OUR MOTOR ,NOWITS DOING IT AGAIN.I GOT THE BACK HALF OF MOUSE VACCUM OUT FROM THE CABIN COMPARTMENT. MY ?  HOW ARE THEY GETTING IN THERE. I'LL SHOW YOU WHAT I FOUND AN EXPLAIN. IN THE ENGINE COMPARTMENT FORD  DIDN'T PUT A SCREEN OVER BLOWER ENTRANCE,.SO I PUT ONE, I RUN  MY FAN ON LOW.
